name: Asclepius
skill: Restores 2268/2708 HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP and cures them of all negative status effects.
ability: Sharply increases crit rate of allies targeted by skill in low chance.
Restores the allies targeted by skill with 100% HP in moderate chance.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a demigod revered as the "god of medicine" for achieving a great deal in various medical fields. However, once she went too far and managed to bring someone back from the dead, which really pissed off Zeus. He claimed that she disrupted the laws of nature, so she has never tried reviving the dead again. But it's not clear if she stopped because he told her to, or if becoming a god made her start following the laws of nature herself.

main: "Bring me your wounded! I can heal anyone!"
summon: "Leave the healing to me! No nip or tuck is too much!"
limit_break: "No matter how powerful I get, no bringing back the dead, alright?"
